name: Candy Clicker (KLOVATER)
description:
____________________________________

pro tip: 

click

____________________________________

You click the candy in the middle of the screen to earn candy. With the candy you can buy upgrades for click power and candy per second. Your goal is to get as many candies as you can or beat the world record.

____________________________________

Note: I won't add load/save because it's to easy to hack and cheat. I'm sorry but I just don't know how to make it so you can't hack the load/save function. And BTW turbo mode doesn't make you get more money.

____________________________________

Music: Kevin Macleod

Art: m u s h y
